title: Jane Skinner Goodell On ‘A Lifetime of Sundays’ Film
text:
Jane Skinner Goodell, former Fox News anchor and wife of NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell, joined the Brian Kilmeade Show today to discuss the film "A Lifetime of Sundays," which she Executive Produced. The 90-minute film looks at the history of the NFL through the eyes of four iconic female owners: Virginia Halas McCaskey (Chicago Bears), Martha Ford (Detroit Lions), Patricia Rooney (Pittsburgh Steelers) and Norma Hunt (Kansas City Chiefs). Watch the full interview below and be sure to catch "A Lifetime of Sundays," Saturday, October 12th at 8pm on the NFL Network or on the ESPN+ app.



Email Embed
